attributes.action: keep services at Hemel Hempstead hospital.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to stop the down-grading of Hemel hosptial. Bring back maternity and leave A&E alone. We the people of Dacorum need and want this hospital.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
